message: Let's be fair, Bob. This is a good deal for both of us.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation
Bob, this is the same deal you offered me, but fairer now considering the inflation. Let's be reasonable and end this.
Considering the inflation, I think this is a fair deal now
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your potential gains too.

Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm accepting your offer from round 2.  Take it before inflation hurts me even more!
